content: this is an easy square using just single & double_crochet stitches it is designed for warm up america http //www warmupamerica org & the finished square measures 7 by 9 & is a great unisex design lightly textured and fun to make don t want to make a full size afghan but would like to help out contact your local michael s store most locations should have a drop off box pattern is a one page pdf suitable for easy printing thanks to pandastamper queene79 tinochka7 marjos honeystalks & colliegrl64 for their test crocheting skills feel free to redistribute & use this pattern in the classroom but please keep this copyright info intact the pattern itself is not for sale please contact me at http //anastaciaknits net with any questions or to let me know what your charity group is going please join my ravelry group at http //www ravelry com/groups/anastacia-knits-designs
